topic.title: Noob question about hosting ZeroNet sites.
topic.body: How would I add a large file to a site, Like some music, Or a game, Without everyone going on the site to download it? It'd take hours to connect if a site had a 150GB file. Is the only real decentralized option a magnet link?

1544937960_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body:
> [blurhy](#comment_208_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): So I should build a better piratebay site on ZeroNet ?

 Y E S

1545287200_1FqHbECdkkaK3ixwJMqE5UJJxpfzZ.body: Not a permanant solution but you could make duckduckgo bangs so for example you might type "!0 zerome.bit" and it would automatically add the localhost ip and port
